select A.*, C.id as banJiLaoShiId, C.xing_ming as banJiLaoShiXingMing from ban_ji A join ban_ji_ban_ji_xue_yuan_zu B on B.ban_ji_id = A.id left join lao_shi C on A.ban_ji_lao_shi_id = C.id
A.id = #{banJiId} and B.xue_yuan_id = #{xueYuanId} and B.is_deleted = 0

select A.id, A.xue_yuan_id as xueYuanId, A.ke_cheng_id as keChengId, A.ke_cheng_zhuang_tai,A.ke_cheng_lei_xing, A.dan_jia, A.ke_cheng_shu_liang, A.zeng_song_ke_shi, A.you_hui_lei_xing, A.you_hui_shu_liang, A.sheng_yu_ke_shi, B.ming_cheng as keChengMingCheng, C.ban_ji_id as banJiId, D.ming_cheng as banJiMingCheng, E.xing_ming as banJiLaoShiXingMing, F.xing_ming as xueYuanXingMing from xue_yuan_ke_cheng A join ke_cheng B on A.ke_cheng_id = B.id left join ban_ji_ban_ji_xue_yuan_zu C on A.xue_yuan_id = C.xue_yuan_id and C.is_deleted = 0 left join ban_ji D on C.ban_ji_id = D.id left join lao_shi E on D.ban_ji_lao_shi_id = E.id join xue_yuan F on A.xue_yuan_id = F.id WHERE A.is_deleted = 0 and A.id = #{id}
